name: It's tough to be a Minotaur
name_original: It's tough to be a Minotaur
description:
Controls:

Move: arrows or Wsad

Attack: Left mouse button

Created for Wowie Jam 2.0! - "Intentional bugs"

Credits:

Game by Maciej Adrian

Story by Maciej Adrian and Kamil Kiesiewicz

Additional artwork Kamil Kiesiewicz

Character sprites: Elthen https://www.patreon.com/elthen

Castle Sprites: Hapiel OpenPixelProject.com

village sprites: Paulina Riva

Starting screen : ansimuz

Dark Lord Sprites: Stephen Challener  https://opengameart.org/users/redshrike

Music: "Dark Amulet" and "Enchanted Festival" by Matthew Pablo

villager attack sounds: remaxim
